duties_responsibilities.duty: Research, develop, and design products as directed under moderate supervision.
Lead development team/teams with multiple projects; supporting and guiding engineers and designers.
Select components and materials, responsible for complete detail drawings and accurate Bill of Materials, and all pertinent documentation.
Assist in field testing new products and evaluating performance and structural integrity for approval or problem resolution.
Release Engineering Change Request (ECR) and Engineering Change Orders (ECO); including all prints and respective BOM required for production upon approval of products.
Assist in overseeing Technicians in the manufacturing of prototypes. Check fit-up accuracy of parts.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Agricultural or Mechanical Engineering required (Master's preferred)
